actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 68 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 31. Record Vote Number: 18.

Amendment SA 68 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration:  CR S1341-1346; text: CR S1341-1342) To provide special minimum funding requirements for certain pension plans maintained pursuant to collective bargaining agreements.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 68 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 31. Record Vote Number: 18.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 68 proposed by Senator Specter.

purpose: To provide special minimum funding requirements for certain pension plans maintained pursuant to collective bargaining agreements.
